title: Assess the Condition of a Public Asset
description: An engineer is performing a scheduled condition assessment of a city bridge.

tasks.description: Locate the bridge in the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer finds the correct asset record for the bridge.

tasks.description: Perform a visual inspection and enter the condition rating for various components (deck, supports, etc.) into a mobile device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer documents the current condition of the bridge components.

tasks.description: Update the asset record with the new condition assessment data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer syncs their findings, updating the central asset database.
